text: Getting help after attemptI had an attempt on Tuesday  I have been so tired of this seemingly endless cycle of SI that I ve been in since jr  high  I have kids and often genuinely feel like everyone in my life would be happier without me  Not initially  though  I know they would be sad  but they could eventually move on and then be better off than having to deal with my shitty brain acting up and getting intensely suicidal   or so times a year   But maybe I can get my brain balanced out  After the attempt  which was dumb and probably bound to not work anyway  in hindsight  I told my husband hours later  He took the day off work the next day and asked me if I wanted to go to the hospital  I didn t  I don t  But I am seriously tired of putting my loved ones through the inconvenience of dealing with my depression   I went in for an assessment and they wanted to keep me inpatient  I explained that I definitely did not want that and that I was not in danger of attempting again any time soon  especially if I got to see a psychiatrist to help adjust my meds  After calling two different doctors I managed to get into the partial hospitalization program  I did the same program last year  two weeks of going in for five and half hours doing group therapy  daily one on one with therapist  and meeting with the psychiatrist about twice a week  I m going to be working really hard to make this the last time I have to go to the hospital for mental health stuff   So seeking help post attempt doesn t necessarily end in being locked  Not that this is a guarantee though  Just wanted to share my experience
summary: There was an attempt on Tuesday. She didn't want to go to the hospital, but she is tired of putting her family through the inconvenience of dealing with her depression. She got into the partial hospitalization program. She did the same program last year. She will spend 5.5 hours a day with a therapist and a psychiatrist.
cleaned: attempt tuesday not want hospital tired put family inconvenience deal depression get partial hospitalization program program year spend hour day therapist psychiatrist

text: unmotivatedThis is one of my alt accounts I have been struggling with depression and anxiety since   but it s only been recently  since maybe april  that I ve been thinking suicidal thoughts  Every single day I think about it more and more and it s becoming unbearable  I m not motivated for life anymore  everything has just become so boring and mundane   I don t know what I m doing anymore  I m so sick of not being able to sleep at night because my anxiety is keeping me up  I m so sick of not being able to open up to people because I m scared they re going to leave me or betray me  I m so sick of constantly worrying if I m hurting people by saying how I truly feel in my emotions  For fucks sake I wasn t even able to open up to a therapist I don t want to hurt my friends or my family but in turn I m just hurting myself and I just want it to be over with  I m going to wait out until after my birthday when I can see my best friend again but I don t know what will happen after that Sorry if that was slightly ranting  this is my first time putting these thoughts into text
